name: brrelex2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.pretty: simprd((Rel(c0)∧ c1[c0]c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)

comment: A true binary relation on a relation implies the second argument is a set. (This is a property of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
